27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Ayyub Al-Ansari narrated that the Messenger of Allah said:: It is not lawful for the Muslim to shun his brother for more than three (days); they come fare to fare and this one turns away, and that one turns away. The best of them is the one who initiates the Salam

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الْهَجْرِ لِلْمُسْلِمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Shunning (The Muslim) Being Disliked
